title: Delete Reaction

params.name: comment_public_id
params.desc: Required. The ID of the Comment.

params.name: emoji
params.desc: Required. The emoji short-code to add / remove. E.g. :thumbsup::skin-tone-4:.

params.name: story_public_id
params.desc: Required. The ID of the Story that the Comment is in.

description: Delete a Reaction from any comment.
